overview_of_class: This course will help students develop the fundamental editing abilities, editorial judgment and editorial management skills required of an entry-level magazine editor in print, digital and mobile platforms. Story framing and pitching, editorial concept work, techniques for guiding writers, and opportunities to create new magazine prototypes are all central themes of the class. Students will gain insight into the magazine industry as well as the skills and options needed for the wide variety of career paths magazines offer.
name: Media Presentation: Magazine
title: JOUR JOUR 311-0-20 Media Presentation: Magazine
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Requisite:  Reserved for students who have taken & passed JOUR 301.
